class.name: CSGSculptedRing3D
class.brief_description: A sculpted ring primitive with advanced sculpting parameters.
class.description: CSGSculptedRing3D is a sculpted ring primitive that extends CSGSculptedPrimitive3D with ring-specific parameters. A ring is another variant of torus with different proportions (thinner, more ring-like). It supports all the sculpting parameters from the base class, allowing you to create complex parametric ring shapes. This node allows you to create a ring for use with the CSG system with advanced sculpting capabilities. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh].
